tagline: My extensions and plugins submitted to Sencha Market for Ext JS and Touch frameworks.
body:
## Content
 * [Ext.ux.form.field.Money](https://github.com/brunotavares/SenchaMarket/tree/master/extjs/money-field)

## Author
I'm a Solutions Engineer at Sencha, experienced with everything on Ext JS and Touch. [Check my blog extdesenv.com](http://extdesenv.com) for full tutorials and good resources on Sencha development.

Also check all [my submissions to Sencha Market](https://market.sencha.com/users/10/addons).  

## Additional resources
 * [SenchaExamples repository](https://github.com/brunotavares/SenchaMarket)
 * [Official Sencha Market](http://market.sencha.com)
 * [Sencha Try!](http://try.sencha.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Bruno's Sencha Market
